idea: A S AGRI AND AQUA LLP HAS BE ESTABLISHED IN THE MARCH 2018. IT HAS BEEN SOLELY SET UP TO INNOVATE AND BRING MODERN TECHNOLOGY TO AGRICULTURE AND AQUACULTURE. WE HAVE OUR OWN INNOVATION AND R&D TEAM WORKING IN THE AREAS OF VERTICAL FARMING AND AQUACULTURE. WE ARE IN THE PROCESS OF PATENTING OUR TECHNOLOGIES IN BOTH THESE AREAS. WE HAVE STANDARDIZED COUPLE OF PRODUCTS AND SERVICES WHICH HAVE BEEN TRIED AND TESTED IN THE MARKET PLACE. WE PROVIDE A MAXIMUM YIELD OF 100 TIMES IN ONE ACRE OF LAND USING OUR TECHNOLOGY. OUR PRESENT CROP IS TURMERIC. WE HAVE GAINED ACTIVE MARKET TRACTION IN MAHARASHTRA WHERE WE ARE EXECUTING 100 PLUS PROJECT FOR FARMERS RANGING FROM 10000 SQ FT TO 1 ACRE. OUR PRODUCTS ARE 100% ORGANIC AND IT IS GROWN IN SOIL BASED FARMING WHERE THE GROWING MEDIA IS OUR OWN INNOVATIVE RECIPE. WE EXTENSIVE USE DRIP IRRIGATION THEREBY USING 85% LESS WATER. WE ARE THE ONLY COMPANY IN INDIA WITH THIS INNOVATIVE PRODUCT AND SERVICE.
name: A S AGRI AND AQUA LLP

idea:
E-Formz is an online business automation and productivity tool. E-Formz takes the forms / documents used daily, and transforms them into intelligent electronic forms, which can be exported to PDF. Not only it prints correctly, it captures the information 100% correct. You can use E-Formz to link multiple documents in a workflow which is completely customized to your business. To put it simply, E-Formz is an online tool to publish filled-up PDF documents and forms.


E-Formz is also an Online Bulk Invoice/Forms Generator to provide Customized Invoicing solution . E-Formz provides Online Bulk Invoicing Software that has all the advantages of customized software at low price tag. With no Installation required and minimal learning curve, generates invoices in bulk from excel or csv. It is compatible with popular E-Commerce websites.
name: Eformz

idea:
Marjan Machinery is a technology start-up company that builds robots for cleaning solar panels. We aim to help every solar owning/leasing entity to reduce their spendings on O&M by smart solar maintenance, employing robots. 


We have a design patent under the designs acts of IP India. 

In less than a year we have generated exports and also server domestic clients.
name: MARJAN MACHINERY LLP
